import React from "react"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import '../DashBoard/style.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import riderImage from '../Assets/charan.jpg' import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const DashBoard: React.FC = () => { const userName = localStorage.getItem("mail"); return (

{userName}

Hey {userName}
Book a ride
Offer a ride
) } export default DashBoard;
